title: Reception workflow: reduce waiting time in 5 steps
author: BISTEC Care Team

content.text: Reception is where patient experience starts. A small delay at the front desk multiplies into stress for doctors and patients.
These steps reduce rework and let your team focus on service, not paperwork.
